post.text: We've made extraordinary progress under President Obama. On November 8, that progress is on the ballot.

comment.author: Abigail
comment.text: After ary was given a subpoena to turn over her email server for investigation she had the contents deleted. Here is the specific law I believe was, and still is, at issue...... https://www.law.cornell.edu/uscode/text/18/2071

replies.author: Rowdy
replies.text: Hey my brothers and sisters get out there and vote and do what Americans do thank you very much The question is will you vote for Donald J Trump or ary Clinton in 2016 either way take care of yourself and have a great American day We have the choice to elect ary or a psychotic, egomaniac, racist who will trample the constitution and our democracy. Please please vote everyone! #ImWithHer #ary2016 If ary becomes president the only people she will help is herself, her family, and her donors. It's time to take back our country. #Trump16 come on everybody let's have a little fun vote for ary Clinton in 2016 and Donald J Trump 2016 yeah you can vote for both of them sounds like fun don't it?
